content: made this as a joke for valentine s day but it turned out pretty cute the top is made of 3 different types of leaf spikes to create a more realistic look but you can make them all the same if you want them to look exactly the same finished size measures to be about 6 5 inches long materials needed purple & green sport weight yarn 3mm crochet hook polyfill or cotton for stuffing scissors darning needle stitch marker pins to help with assembly
